body:
Not sure what you're trying to count there, but Application.count doesn't make too much sense to mee. If you're trying to count the objects for the model in the current controller, you could do something like:

if params[:controller]
  params[:controller].classify.constantize.try(:count) || 0
end

So, in that way, it won't throw an error when the model doesn't exists... it will return 0
title: undefined method `count' for Application:Class
